bibl.title: The Bologna and Lecce Universities Joint Archaeological Mission in Egypt: Ten Years of Excavations at Bakchias (1993-2002). (Gli Album del Centro di Studi Papirologici dell'Università degli Studi di Lecce. 4.)
bibl.note: M.C., P.D. and S.P., Preface. - S.P., The Previous Excavations. - P.D., New Results from the Archaeological Excavation in Bakchias: 1993-2002. - M.C., Papyrological Assessment: 1993-2002. - G.B. and L.V., Geographical Information and Surveying Technologies. - Bibliography on Bakchias.

BITELLI Gabriele, Mario CAPASSO, Paola DAVOLI, Sergio PERNIGOTTI and Luca VITTUARI, The Bologna and Lecce Universities Joint Archaeological Mission in Egypt: Ten Years of Excavations at Bakchias (1993-2002). (Gli Album del Centro di Studi Papirologici dell'Università degli Studi di Lecce. 4.)
Napoli, Graus, 2003, 4°, 70 pp., 1 carte, 31 pll. coul. + 1 CD-ROM. ISBN 88-8346-046-4. €25.
